circumstances: The crew was completing a night mail flight to Charlotte-Douglas Airport. On short final, both engines stopped simultaneously. The aircraft stalled and crashed few miles short of runway and was destroyed upon impact. Both crew members were killed.
probable_cause:
The accident was probably caused by the combination of the following factors: 
- Engine failure resulting in a spin during final approach, 
- Inadequate preflight preparation and/or planning on part of the crew, 
- Fuel exhaustion.
